import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";import linearGradient from"assets/theme/functions/linearGradient";var transparent=colors.transparent,gradients=colors.gradients;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var colored=boxShadows.colored;var stepper={styleOverrides:{root:{background:linearGradient(gradients.info.main,gradients.info.state),padding:"".concat(pxToRem(24)," 0 ").concat(pxToRem(16)),borderRadius:borderRadius.lg,boxShadow:colored.info,"&.MuiPaper-root":{backgroundColor:transparent.main}}}};export default stepper;
